meanings.definition: The transmission of information over long distances by electronic means.
meanings.sent1: My dad works for a telecom that helps people talk to each other far away.
meanings.sent2: I called my friend using a telecom to chat with her across the country.
meanings.sent3: The telecom must have been tired after carrying all those messages across the world!
meanings.sent4: The internet is like a vast telecom, connecting people from different corners of the globe.
meanings.sent5: The telecom hummed with activity as data traveled through its electronic pathways.

meanings.definition: A company that provides telecommunications services.
meanings.sent1: I signed up with a new telecom for my phone and internet services.
meanings.sent2: The telecom sent a technician to fix my landline connection.
meanings.sent3: The telecom's logo was a cute little phone talking to a computer - so clever!
meanings.sent4: In a world full of noise, the telecom stood out as a reliable source of communication.
meanings.sent5: The telecom's customer service was top-notch, always ready to assist with any issues.
